hard: Helios – Artemis has a natural built-in critical hit chance so Helios will take her down with no problems.
Lian – Charms Artemis once she hits her. Artemis has a lot of aoe damage so she will get charmed quite a lot.
soft: Armor artifact – Artemis is a physical damage dealer. Use armor artifact to deny damage to her.
High aoe damage – Artemis has low defense stats. Use heroes like Keira or DOH combo to kill her with aoe damage.
Artemis is a weak DPS hero in general. You shouldn’t have problems countering her if you follow meta-team compositions.
